website_summaries.verdict: The Epson Stylus NX515 is a capable machine that will improve the efficiency of any office or work-at-home setup. Not only is it a lightning-fast all-in-one, but it also has a broader range of features than most other $150 AIOs. As long as you don't need a full creative software suite, the Epson Stylus NX515 will make a dependable sidekick to your computer.
pros: Fastest output speeds on any inkjet to date

customer_reviews.title: Another dissatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a few years, even considering the absurd price of ink and mandatory shutdown of all functions if you run out of cyan or something. But then I stopped using it for a few months, the ink on the printer heads dried up, and now the print quality is permanently messed up. The built-in nozzle cleaning function just sprays more ink everywhere and makes the problem worse. I even tried manually cleaning the nozzles, which was a huge pain considering that you can't remove them. No luck. It's a paperweight now. Lesson learned: you should never buy inkjet printers if you can avoid it. But if you must use inkjet, definitely avoid Epson.
customer_reviews.author: Janus

customer_reviews.title: Worse printer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer a couple of weeks and have only printed about 50 pages. The black ink levels are already at 1/2. The quality is terrible: blurry, faint, lines missing, looks smeared. The unit is really loud! It has the option of printing in quiet mode (I can see why - but I've never even heard of that as an option on a printer before.) The printer has all sorts of features to help fix printing issues (nozzle check, clean heads, print head alignment) none of which resolve the printing issues. I have never bought an Epson before, and after this experience, never will again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good performance
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to replace freestanding flatbed scanner and inkjet printer units. It works great and required no special effort to install (not used wirelessly). As a copier it is very convenient with one-button use. The print function is very good, if noisy. Do not attempt to use the draft mode, as it is illegible. The scanner function seems to be a good quality, but the scanner on-screen commands are not particularly intuitive, compared to our old HP unit. Overall, a good choice for the money, for home use.
customer_reviews.author: J and G G

customer_reviews.title: OBSOLETE AND IN THE TRASH
customer_reviews.text: When it was working, it did a great job. I bought this in Oct 2009 and the black finally stopped printing in July 2013. I got about 4 years out of it. Of course getting them fixed is ridiculous, cheaper to just buy a new printer. Went with a HP this time, all in one. Epson doesn't make em anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Ink Problems
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but ink problems with this printer. Bought several new ink cartridges thinking it was the ink only to figure out it was the printer. Returned printer and received a "refurbished" one and now that one is doing the very same thing. I would not recommend this printer or at least buy it from someone local so when you start having problems you can return it. Returning it by mail is a hassle and you're out of a printer for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this printer. Setting it up was slightly complicated, but the instructions that come with the printer are pretty straightforward. I love that it's able to connect to my home network wirelessly. The print quality is great and it's very fast, even on the quiet setting. My one annoyance is the noise. Granted, the quiet printing setting reduces a lot of it and it still prints very fast with it on, but without the quiet print setting it's LOUD. It's really a minor annoyance though, as the quiet printing setting fixes that and it still prints very fast with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cabinet Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Disposable printer--works only a few months and paper jams forever
customer_reviews.text: Repeated paper jams--now not working at all following simple paper jam. Has required many premature ink cartridge replacements, wasting money over and over. Does not deal with different sizes of paper. And yes I bought it at Amazon who listed rave reviews. Phooey I am only a home user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: Nice printer. Easy setup of both wired and wireless with all other computers in house from XP to Windows 7 machines. My first networked printer and it is very fast and nice to have all printer and scanner features available on all computers. As noted elsewhere, it is noisy but only when first loading paper. Choose this one over Artisan because we needed to run heavy stock and this has the striaght thru feed allowing the heavier stock to feed without problems. Very fast printing and scanning. It replaces an older Epson RX 500 all in one and I must say I like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Janis L. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Easy Setup, Ink Use Outrageous
customer_reviews.text: Wireless setup was easy, scans to file easily, print is above average. Ink use kills the good points.. will not print B & W if a color cartridge is empty and uses small amount of color when printing B & W. so keep extra cartridges around and you will not find them remanufactured Ink volume of new cartridge is low, amount is not even noted on package. AUG 2010, WISH I HAD WAITED AND READ THE LATER POSTS...I ONLY USE THIS TO SCAN TO FILE. BOUGHT ANOTHER PRINTER TO PRINT B & W.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hollis

customer_reviews.title: An All In One should have a fax feature - this one does not.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I would say this is a very good printer/scanner/copier. Print speed is fast and the quality is good. It seems to use more ink than I'm used to (I've owned another Epson and a Brother before). Start up is loud and sometimes a little startling (paper feed). It is compact but sturdy in construction. My biggest disappointment is that I expected to be able to send a fax because it is described as an ALL IN ONE. My others had a fax feature. This one does not. So if you need to fax, keep looking. Other than that, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer! Scanner works great as well. Will buy another one like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible restrictions
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact that this printer eats up ink like no other, once the ink is low, all functionality (scanning, fax) shuts down, despite the fact that functionality such as scanning would not seem to need any ink. I rather buy a new printer (NEVER again Epson), than spend another dime on this one!
customer_reviews.author: intrepid 101

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: So far I can only say this has been a very wise decision. The quality for the money cannot really be beat. Especially with the blue tooth capability, which is the only way I use it. I recommend this printer all in one to anyway despite my limited use in one month.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Draft Mode Is Not Usefull
customer_reviews.text: Draft mode is too light to be of use. My HP printer had the option to set the quality of draft mode but not this epson. Also you won't go long before you need to buy ink - its a guzzler. I see those as serious issues so only 2 stars. Print quality is outstanding though.
customer_reviews.author: HiwayTrader

customer_reviews.title: Good and Noise
customer_reviews.text: The printer is sharp and good and noise when printing and won't print at all when you use 3 hole paper which is not mentioned anywhere on the spec sheet.Other than that Great printer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Branham Sr

customer_reviews.title: Stay at home Mom
customer_reviews.text: It does not fax but does everything It only takes up a little space Is quiet and efficient Print quality is great( I did not expect that for the price) Also whenever you print amazon gives you the option window to buy more ink etc.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home Mom

customer_reviews.title: Epson wireless printer is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several other wireless printers and they were not always connected to the wireless network without tinkering (turning on/off, etc.) ... the Epson Stylus was easy to set up and is also immediately available on the network. Quality of copies of great and so far ink is managed well. Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pennie

customer_reviews.title: All in one printer.
customer_reviews.text: This printer works great and is really fast. I am all thumbs when changing ink and adding paper and so far, have managed not to screw this up. Great printer.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last at all, just long enough for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last at all,just long enough for the 30 day warrent to be over, and couldn't send it back,thought it was junk
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lorenzi

customer_reviews.title: Good printer for the cost
customer_reviews.text: The Stylus NX515 WiFi is a good printer at a low cost. WiFi set up was pretty easy and print quality is good. Goes through the small ink cartridges quickly if you do alot of printing, but overall I've been happy with my selection.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap printer that actually works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to replace a big clunky HP I own. It is nice and compact and was easy to set up. I am impressed with the features for the money. I really like the wireless feature; no cords to fight with or hide. Unfortunately it has a large appetite for ink cartridges but overall I am very pleased. I will review after I have owned and used it for a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Haley

customer_reviews.title: never again this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize from the picture it was this big I was looking for something smaller. It will serve the purpose for now but I will never get another online.
customer_reviews.author: jewell's toy

customer_reviews.title: The garbage is the only place for this printer and be ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work any more. Always something new that makes this machine fail. The garbage is the only place for this printer and be glad as the ink has to be replaced so often it's crazy, just a bad purchase, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F.

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The printing heads clogged. The ink cost me $75 to replace and still doesn't work and there is no easy way to unclog it. I have a fancy Epson paper weight now. Noisy as heck. Don't know what to do. I've had it for less than two months and have only used it very sparingly. Ugh! I'll probably buy a new printer rather than repair because I don't want to deal with the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: John Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.....
customer_reviews.text: Chews through ink like no ones business also has a tendency to forget its on the network and the wireless has now stopped working altogether. Going from a non networked to a networked printer is nice but when it like to hop off the network on its own it can be kinda annoying. With the added negative of it burning through ink I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to replace an HP printer. Worked much better. I owned this product for a good while before I had to replace due to over use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bolinger

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Does everything exceptionally well. Had bought an epson about 3 months earlier and was so impressed I went to get another. That model wasn't availible so I moved up to this one. For the money you can't beat it, the ink is also very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: manuver

customer_reviews.title: The original ink monster
customer_reviews.text: This product prints well but is the ultimate ink monster. I have it less than one year and for economic reasons print mostly in draft/gray mode and yet THE COLOR CARTRIDGES disappear (at least it seems like they disappear). I am shopping for another printer currently.
customer_reviews.author: EMU

customer_reviews.title: Epson wireless printers
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Epson NX510 printer for one month and already had to replace the black ink cartridge. No free shipping for direct orders unless you order large quantity. IT WILL NOT SCAN!! Have contacted their online help, plus Microsoft, geek squad and their fixes don't work. it appears to be a software problem. The only place I can put it is on top shelf of my desk which means I have to get on a stepstool half the time I use it to be able to see the buttons. Had I known all this before I ordered it, I would have gotten an HP.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A NUNI Hancy-Learman

customer_reviews.title: Actually works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use. Found network with no problem. Software CD setup Toshiba Satellite Laptop without any problems on first try. This is the way it's supposed to work!
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This reasonably priced printer is easy to set up and has great print quality. The only feature that I wish it had is fax capability.
customer_reviews.author: Windy City Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Excellent Printer/Scanner/Copier
customer_reviews.text: The features of this product are great. The one minor glitch is that the paper has to be lined up very "correctly" in the paper holder or it misfires. We change often from recycled paper to good new paper so this is an inconvienience for us. If you do not change paper it would not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: jajic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Used item twice it used up all the ink and made a noise like it was going to get up off the table and run away.Unfortunately i was not able to set the printer up and use beyone the 30 days return so i guess i'm stuck.
customer_reviews.author: coach57

customer_reviews.title: Epson NX515 All-In-One Printer
customer_reviews.text: At first i was not wild about an all-in-one printer. It was easy to setup, it paired wirelessly with my laptop flawlessly. It is connected to my desktop via USB, again with no problems, considering my laptop is running Vista Home Premium and the desktop is running XP Home Edition. To make copies the computer does not have to be on and you can print directly from a varity of cards. Overall i would rate this printer excellent and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful printer....
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous printer and well worth the wait. It was seriously back ordered although I did not know this until after I ordered and phoned and then all of a sudden it showed up. I did not like waiting so long; nonetheless, it is a terrific printer and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Ink Efficiency!
customer_reviews.text: The printer is fine (nothing spectacular) and the options on it are great especially for the price. But what you save in cost of printer you over spend in ink.
customer_reviews.author: stl

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I had it for five months. Loved it until now.It does not recognize the new replacement cartridges and the printer turns off when inserting a memory card. Where do I dispose of this piece of junk????
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Witlin

customer_reviews.title: My stylus
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this All-in-one because I used my sister-in-law's Epson scanner, and really liked the color restoration feature in the scanner software. I am very happy with my purchase. I love the wireless capability, and the wireless set up was very simple and took no time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F.

customer_reviews.title: So easy!! And works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it was really easy to set up, found wi-fi right away, and worked perfectly the first time we used it! And now I don't have to find someone to print my daughters homework at midnight the night before it's due!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Downey

customer_reviews.title: The Epson Stylus NX515 is an outstanding printer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fast printer. It is well priced, and the ink is affordable. I would have been willing to pay a bit more to have had fax capability! If you do not need this to send faxes, you cannot ask for a better printer at an outstanding price!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie K. Heinemannn

customer_reviews.title: Broke in two year and overpriced ink
customer_reviews.text: Only two years since we bought this and it no longer works, despite light use. Ink cartridges are expensive and don't last long. In summary, in this experience the printer broke within two years and we felt gouged every time we bought ink.
customer_reviews.author: artdancer

customer_reviews.title: Epson review
customer_reviews.text: The printer was priced at the level of printers with fewer features as well as slower printing speeds. The quality of prints on plain paper is excellent, I have not tried it as a photo printer. I love the enlarging/reducing feature, generally available on more expensive machines.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: quick snapshot
customer_reviews.text: The noise is awful on this printer. It starts to print with an actual bang. The type quality for documents is very nice however, even at lower print quality settings.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and was fairly easy to set up. The print quality is very good, but it's a little noisy when it loads the paper. We might have to move it out of the nursery/office because we can't run it when the baby is sleeping. Other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the new printer. Excellent quality, Looks good. Pretty quiet. Very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shorey H. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Epson Stylus NX515
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic printer for the price, great scan quality and print speed. WiFi setup very easy, and the Epson software isn't as bloated as other printer manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: dschnurjr

customer_reviews.title: So Far.... GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I had an Epson NX105 before, This one is so much better. Print quality good, faster, had a little difficulty loading w/Windows 7 but worked it out. It's just been 2 wks so time will tell!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: great printer
customer_reviews.text: For $109, this printer is fantastic. Easy to set up, prints quickly and colors are bright. Haven't used all the features yet, but its handy to have the ability to scan too. Separate color cartridges are nice so you can replace them individually.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: The ink is as expensive as the printer - and the machine WILL NOT LET YOU USE THE SCANNER unless your ink is full enough for it's liking. Dumb. I will never buy epson again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewin

customer_reviews.title: I returned it!
customer_reviews.text: Scanning takes too long. The printing takes a long while to start too. I sent it back to Amazon a couple of days ago. Will buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ian J. Saldanha

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for edible ink only for cake decorating.Very easy to use and the print quality is great
customer_reviews.author: jeleben

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer, Good Service
customer_reviews.text: An excellent printer. Wi-Fi works perfectly. Terrible paper holder (should be a tray). Jams a lot. But quality of printer and ease of use are first-rate.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Saltzman

customer_reviews.title: Epson Stylus NX 515 the Best!
customer_reviews.text: After using various printers over the years, I have found the Epson NX515 to be one of the fastest printers with excellent print quality!
customer_reviews.author: The Principal

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Many good features for the price, fast printing, excellent scanner. Easy to set up and use and compact in size.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer/scanner/copier! Its a little noisy even on quiet mode, but i guess its not a big problem. It makes great copies and print-outs. I have also bought some photo paper and pictures look great. This is a really great all in one printer for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Epson NX-515 Review
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and I like the printer very much EXCEPT for the ammount of ink it uses. The ink cartridges should be larger.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Printer for a cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Had this printer for about 3 weeks and its really good, and the price is very reasonable for this particular product, I dont like the lack of a fax but everything else works very good so I would recommend this printer for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Epson Stylus NX515
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXCELLENT printer for the money. It is quite fast and the print quality is excellent. We are VERY PLEASED and certainly recommend this printer for home usage. My daughter teaches pre-kindergarten and SHE really gives it a workout for her school work for the students.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Wireless and Speed are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Epson Stylus NX515 is excellent All in one (does not have fax) printer. The best features is the wireless setup, which gives me to print from my laptop. Print speed is really fast, Great quality prints. Good scanner, with choices of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Venu gopal Kande

customer_reviews.title: Terry's Review
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up on wireless network. Print quality is amazingly good. Speed is great. Ink usage is a bit fast, but cartridges are inexpensive. All-in-all, a great buy for the price. Amazon had the best price by a mile. -TDC
customer_reviews.author: T. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Super quality for a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: Epson Stylus NX515 WiFi Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer (C11CA48231) I couldn't be more pleased with this printer. The price was right- especially through Amazon. It was easy to set up and each function worked well. Although it is far faster than any printer I've had before I was particularly impressed with the print quality. I should be using this printer for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ruge

customer_reviews.title: Epson Stylus NX515
customer_reviews.text: I found set-up to be quite easy. I bought this printer in Oct.2009, so far, no problems. Printing is great, a bit noisy though, but a minor thing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Luttrull

customer_reviews.title: Epson NX515
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I chose this printer and it has lived up to very good reviews. Wireless installation was very simple, just load a special driver from the CD. I haven't used long enough to comment on ink usage. One flaw is that draft mode printing is very faint, almost unusable. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer
customer_reviews.text: Good printer. I like it, especially when compared to my old Epson. It works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Awesome printer!!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is everything I expected and more!! I love it!! My only complaint regarding this order is that shipping took a little longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy easy wireless setup. Fast printing, excellent quality text, pics and scans.
customer_reviews.author: Occam's Hatchet

product_meta.title: Epson Stylus NX515 WiFi Color Inkjet All-in-One Printer (C11CA48231)
product_meta.description:
Be smart and simplify your life with the Epson Stylus NX515 all-in-one with built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet networking. Share one printer to print, scan or access memory card slots1 from anywhere in your home - all without wires. The NX515 prints up to 2x faster than competitively priced models, with maximum print speeds of 36 ppm black/color and laser quality speeds of 15 ppm black and 9.3 ppm colors. With the NX515, you get remarkable results every time. Print outstanding documents and amazing photos. With its large, 2.5-inch LCD screen and built-in memory card slots, you can even print stacks of borderless photos, PC-free. And, with photo enhancement tools better than the competition, like Automatic Photo Correction and photo restoration, you're sure to get perfect prints every time.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Smart. Simple. Amazing. — Be smart and simplify your life with the Epson Stylus NX515 all-in-one with built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet networking. Share one printer to print, scan or access memory card slots1 from anywhere in your home — all without wires. The NX515 prints up to 2x faster than competitively priced models2, with maximum print speeds of 36 ppm black/color and laser quality speeds of 15 ppm black and 9.3 ppm color†. With the NX515, you get remarkable results every time. Print outstanding documents and amazing photos. With its large, 2.5-inch LCD screen and built-in memory card slots, you can even print stacks of borderless photos, PC-free. And, with photo enhancement tools better than the competition, like Automatic Photo Correction and photo restoration, you’re sure to get perfect prints every time. 



Get more for your money

With the Epson Stylus NX series, you get impressive features, superior quality and performance, and a better value overall, compared to competitive products at the same price point. The NX515 boasts the fastest print speeds in its class (up to 2x faster than competitively priced models2), built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet networking, high quality scanning, better image enhancement tools and a large, 2.5-inch color LCD screen.






What the press is saying:

"The NX515 not only earns its Editors' Choice award with room to spare, but resets the bar for what to expect from a home AIO." M. David Stone, PCMag.com, (9.2.09). Reprinted with permission. Copyright 2009 Ziff Davis Publishing Holdings Inc. All Rights Reserved. 




Wireless access from anywhere in your home

Eliminate unnecessary wires and be more efficient, while sharing one printer at home. With built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet networking, you can print, scan and access memory card slots wirelessly1. It’s never been easier to use your all-in-one from anywhere in your home and share one product with multiple PCs.


Everyday projects made easy The Epson Stylus NX515 is ideal for all your everyday projects. Scan and save important documents and photos. Make a high-quality copy, in color or black-and-white, with just one touch. Or, make multiple copies with ease. You can even reduce and enlarge documents and photos instantly — from 25 to 400%. Use the included software to create photo calendars and more. And, pair your all-in-one with Epson specialty paper to create colorful fliers and greeting cards.



Quality and speed — the fastest print speed in its class2

Print documents with crisp, sharp text and photos with vivid, true-to-life color. The Epson Stylus NX515 delivers exceptional quality output, without sacrificing speed. Engineered with award-winning MicroPiezo® ink jet technology, this powerful performer prints up to 2x faster1 than competitively priced all-in-ones with maximum print speeds of 36 ppm black and color and laser quality print speeds of 15 ppm black and 9.3 ppm color†.


Amazing borderless photos, PC-free!

Borderless photos are easy to achieve, with or without a computer! Print borderless photos in multiple sizes right from your memory card or camera. With a 2.5-inch LCD, PictBridge™ support and built-in memory card slots, it's easy. Amaze your friends and family with PC-free photo restoration. Automatically bring the color back to old, faded photos at the touch of a button, without a computer.


OriginalEpsonCompetitor 
Better image enhancement tools

Epson sets the highest standards for image quality compared to competitive products. Get amazing results automatically. Auto Photo Correction will correct the lighting in poorly exposed images to ensure you never print a bad photo. And, it includes advanced face detection, which distinguishes people from scenery, correcting the color accordingly to ensure beautiful, natural skin tones for results better than the competition. Also, with just the click of a button and no special software, you can even remove red eye.


Replace only the color you need!

The Epson Stylus NX515 is smart to own. Individual ink cartridges give you control over ink usage. There are even multiple sizes available to accommodate your budget and specific print volume needs. Best of all, only one set of cartridges is needed to print amazing documents and outstanding photos. There’s no need to spend additional money on specialized cartridges to print photos.


EpsonCompetitor 

Worry-free handling

While many competitive inks often take several minutes to dry, prints made with DURABrite® Ultra pigment ink allow you to handle documents and photos immediately after printing. Prints are smudge and water resistant — and even highlighter friendly. Plain paper documents resist fading up to six times longer than leading competitive prints3, making it easier than ever to archive important documents.




Save paper with two-sided printing

With the Epson Stylus NX515, it’s easy to print on both sides of the paper, saving money and paper. In fact, with manual, two-sided printing, you’ll save up to 50% of your paper supply1.

Product protection you can count on

The Epson Stylus NX515 comes standard with a one-year limited warranty. It also includes a quick and convenient product exchange program. So, you can rest easy, knowing you have dependable service and support.


BE MORE INFORMED
The new international ISO print speed standard Print speed is critically important when buying a printer or all-in-one. But how do you compare print speeds when different manufacturers measure in different ways? Now you can. Much like the "MPG" ratings on new cars, there's now a new industry standard for measuring print speed, which allows for an "apples-to-apples" comparison between different printer models and brands. The International Organization for Standardization (widely known as ISO) developed this industry approved and internationally accepted standard, specifically for ink jet printers and all-in-ones. It measures "out of the box" (default) print speeds using "real world" printing scenarios, so you can be sure you're getting a product that performs at the speed you need.


Features/Benefits

 * Wi-Fi and Ethernet built in — share one printer with multiple PCs, wired or wirelessly; print, scan and share memory card files between your PC and printer, wirelessly1
 * Fastest print speeds in its class — up to 2x faster than competitively priced models2; maximum print speeds of 36 ppm black/color, laser quality print speeds of 15 ppm black and 9.3 ppm color†
 * PC-free, borderless photos in a snap — 2.5-inch, tilt LCD screen and built-in memory card slots
 * Scan directly to e-mail4 — restore the color to old, faded photos; better than the competition
 * Superior image enhancement tools — red-eye removal, automatic photo restoration, Automatic Photo Correction and more
 * Save time — make multiple copies (1 — 99) with one touch; instantly reduce and enlarge copies 25 – 400%
 * Manual Two-sided printing1 — a great way to save paper
 * Replace only the color you need — individual ink cartridges, available in different sizes
 * Truly touchable photos and documents — instant-dry ink for smudge, fade and water resistant prints
 * Unsurpassed print quality — get sharp documents and photos with precision detail and more accurate color
 * Standard ink set included — includes one 69 Black ink cartridge and three 69 color ink cartridges
 * Packaging Specifications — Dimensions 20.3 x 9.1 x 15.7 in (W x D x H) and Weight 16.5 lb.

Eco features

 * Save up to 50% of your paper supply with manual, two-sided printing1
 * ENERGY STAR® qualified
 * Designed to be Recycled5

Epson Stylus NX series
Smart. Simple. Amazing.

Extraordinary results are easy to achieve with an Epson NX series product. Ideal for all your everyday projects, these fast, affordable all-in-ones deliver quality without compromise. With award-winning ink jet technology and smart, intuitive features, Epson NX series products ensure premium quality results at a price that’s sure to please.











 1. Some functions may not be supported by Mac®, like two-sided printing and accessing memory cards when the All-in-One is networked.
 2. Printing black text in default mode compared to ink jet all-in-ones priced at $149 or less as of January 2009.
 3. Ink fade resistance ratings based on accelerated testing of unframed color prints in indoor display conditions. Claim that documents resist fading up to six times longer is based on accelerated testing of unframed color prints on plain paper in indoor display conditions. Actual print stability will vary according to light intensity, temperature, humidity and other factors. Epson does not guarantee the longevity of prints. See www.wilhelm-research.com
 4. Scan to e-mail works with MAPI-Type e-mail programs such as Microsoft® Outlook, but not with web-based e-mail programs such as Yahoo or Gmail™.
